Translations.Text: anivakuttu nirpavarkal mitu cattiyamaka
palamaka virattupavarkal mitu cattiyamaka
(ninaivuttum) vetattai otuvor mitu cattiyamaka
niccayamaka unkalutaiya nayan oruvane
vanankalukkum, pumikkum, ivvirantirkum itaiye ullavarrukkum (avane) iraivan; kilticaikalin iraivan
niccayamaka name (pumikku) camipamaka irukkum vanattai natcattirankalin alakaik kontu alakupatuttiyirukkirom
(atait) tiya saittankal anaivarukkum tataiyakavum (akkinom)
(atanal) avarkal melana kuttattar (peccai olintu) ketka mutiyatu innum, avarkal ovvor ticaiyiliruntum vici eriyappatukirarkal
(avarkal) turattappatukirarkal; avarkalukku nilaiyana vetanaiyumuntu
(etenum ceytiyai) iraincic cella murpattal, appolutu avanaip pirakaca tippantam pintotarum

akave, "pataippal avarkal valiyavarkala allatu nam pataittirukkum (vanam, pumi ponravaiya) enru (nirakaripporitam napiye!) Nir ketpiraka! Niccayamaka nam avarkalaip picupicuppana kalimannaltan pataittirukkinrom
(napiye! Allahvin vallamaiyaik kantu) nir accariyappatukirir; (anal) avarkal parikacam ceykinranar
anriyum, avarkalukku ninaivuttappattalum, (atanai) avarkal ninaiviliruttik kolvatillai
avarkal (etenum) or attatciyaik kantalum, (atai) mettapparikacam ceykinranar
itu pakirankamana cuniyameyanri verillai" enrum avarkal kurukinranar
Nankal irantu, mannakavum elumpukalakavum nankal akivittalum, meyyakave (nankal mintum uyirppittu) eluppappatupavarkala? (Enrum ketkinranar)
avvare, muntaiya nam tantaiyarkaluma? (Eluppappatuvarkal? Enrum ketkinranar)
am! (Unkal ceyalkalin karanamaka) ninkal cirumaiyataintavarkala(kavum eluppappatu)virkal" enru (napiye!) Nir kurum
ore captam tan! Utane avarkal (titukkittu eluntu) parpparkal
(avvelai)"enkalutaiya kete! Itu kuli kotukkum nalayirre" enru avarkal kuruvar
ninkal poyppikka murpattuk kontiruntirkale antat tirppu nal itutan!" (Enru avarkalukkuk kurappatum)
aniyayam ceytarkale avarkalaiyum avarkalutaiya tunaikalaiyum, avarkal vanankik kontiruntavarraiyum onru cerunkal
allahvaiyanri (avarkal valipattavai avai) pinnar avarkalai, narakattin pataikku kontu cellunkal
innum, avarkalai (anke) nirutti vaiyunkal; avarkal niccayamakak (kelvi kanakkuk) ketkappata ventiyavarkal" (enru malakkukalukkuk kurappatum)
unkalukku enna nerntatu? Ninkal en oruvarukkoruvar (ulakil ceytatu ponru) utavi ceytu kollavillai?" (Enru ketkappatum)
anal avarkal annalil (etuvum ceyya iyalatu talai kunintu) kilpatintavarkalaka irupparkal
avarkalil cilar cilarai munnokki, oruvarai oruvar kelvi kettu(t tarkkittuk) kontum irupparkal
(tam talaivarkalai nokki)"niccayamaka ninkal valappurattiliruntu (caktiyutan) enkalitam varukiravarkalaka iruntirkal" enru kuruvarkal
(Appatiyalla!) Ninkal tam muhminkalaka - nampikkai kontoray - irukkavillai!" Enru a(ttalai)varkal kuruvar
anriyum unkal mitu enkalukku evvita atikaramum irukkavillai eninum ninkal tam varampu katantu pavam ceyyum kuttattaraka iruntirkal
akaiyal, enkal iraivanutaiya vakku enkal mitu unmaiyaki vittatu niccayamaka nam (yavarum vetanaiyaic) cuvaippavarkal tam
(am) nankal unkalai valiketuttom; niccayamaka nankale valikettuttan iruntom
akave, annalil niccayamaka avarkal vetanaiyil kuttanavarkalakave irupparkal
kurravalikalai ivvaru tan nam niccayamaka natattuvom
allahvaittavira nayan illai" enru avarkalukkuk kurappattal, meyyakave avarkal perumaiyatittavarkalaka iruntanar
oru paittiyakkarap pulavarukkaka nankal meyyaka enkal teyvankalaik kaivittu vitukiravarkala?" Enrum avarkal kurukirarkal
appatiyalla! Avar cattiyattaiye kontu vantirukkirar; anriyum (tamakku munnar vanta) tutarkalaiyum unmaippatuttukirar
(itai nirakaripporayin) niccayamaka ninkal novinai tarum vetanaiyai anupavippavarkal tam
anal, ninkal ceytu kontiruntavarrukkanri (veru) etarkum ninkal kuli kotukkappatamattirkal
allahvutaiya antaranka cuttiyana atiyarkalo (enin)
avarkalukku ariyappattulla unavu avarkalukku irukkiratu
kani vakaikal (alikkappatum), innum avarkal kanniyappatuttappatuvarkal
inpam alikkum cuvarkkankalil
oruvaraiyoruvar munnokkiyavaru kattilkal mitu (amarntirupparkal)
telivana panam nirainta kuvalaikal avarkalacai; curri kontuvarum
(Atu) mikka venmaiyanatu aruntuvorukku maturamanatu
atil ketutiyum iratu atanal avarkal putti tatumarupavarkalum allar
innum, avarkalitattil atakkamana parvaiyum, netiya kankalum konta (amara kanniyarum) irupparkal
(tuymaiyil avarkal cippikalil) maraikkappatta muttukkalaip pol irupparkal
(appolutu) avarkalil oru cilar cilarai munnokkiyavaru pecik kontirupparkal
avarkalil oruvar; enakku (im'maiyil) urra nanpan oruvan iruntan enak kuruvar
(maranattirkup pin uyirppikkap patuvom enpatai) unmaiyena erpavarkalil niccayamaka niyum oruvana enak kettan
nam irantu mannakavum, elumpukalakavumaki vittapin, (mintum nam uyirppikkappattu) kuli valankapperuvoma?" Enrum kettan
(avvaru kuriyavanai)"ninkal park(ka virumpu)kirirkala?" Enrum kuruvar
avar (kile) nokkinar; avanai narakattin natuvil parttar
(avanitam)"allahvin mitu cattiyamaka! Ni ennai alittuvita murpattaye
en iraivanutaiya arul illatiruntal, nanum (narakattirkuk) kontu varappattavarkalil oruvanakiyiruppen
(marrorumuraiyum) nam irantu vituvoma
(illai) namakku muntiya maranattait tavira verillai anriyum, nam vetanai ceyyappatupavarkalum allar" enru kuruvar
niccayamaka itutan makattana verriyakum
enave patupatupavarkal itu ponratarkakave patupataventum
atu cirappana virunta? Allatu (narakattilirukkum kalli)'jakkum' enra marama
niccayamaka nam atai aniyayakkararkalukku oru cotanaiyakave ceytirukkirom
meyyakave atu narakattin atittalattiliruntu valarum maramakum
Atan palaikal saittankalin talaikalaip polirukkum
niccayamaka, avarkal atilirunte pucipparkal; ataikkontu tankalutaiya vayirukalai nirappik kolvarkal
pinnar, niccayamaka avarkalukkuk kutikka, kotikkum nir kotukkappatum
atan pinnar avarkal milum talam niccayamaka narakamtan
niccayamaka avarkal tam mutataiyarkalai vali kettileye kantarkal
akaiyal, avarkalutaiya aticcuvatukalmite ivarkalum viraintarkal
innum, ivarkalukku munnarum appantaiya makkalil perumpalor vali kettiruntanar
melum, niccayamaka nam avarkalitaiye accamutti eccarippavarkalai anuppinom
piraku, avvaru accamutti eccarikkappattavarkalin mutivu ennavayirrenru (napiye!) Nir parum
allahvutaiya antaranka cuttiyana atiyarkalait tavira
anriyum nuh nam'maip pirarttittar; pirarttanaikku patilalippatil name cirantor avom
akave, nam avaraiyum avarutaiya kutumpattaraiyum mikapperun kastattiliruntu patukattom
melum, avarkalutaiya cantatiyarai (piralayattiliruntu kapparri pirkalam) nilaittirukkumpati ceytom
melum, avarukkakap pirkalattavarkku (oru napakarttattai) vittu vaittom
salamun alanuh" - akilankal enkum nuh mitu salam untavataka
ivvare, nanmai ceyvorukku nicyamaka nam kuli kotukkirom
niccayamaka avar (nuh) muhminkalana nam nallatiyarkalil ninrumullavar
piraku nam marravarkalai (vellattil) mulkatittom
niccayamaka, iprahimum avarutaiya valiyaip pinparriyavarkalil oruvartam
avar tuya nencattutan tam'mutaiya iraivanitam vantapotu (napiye! Nir ninaivu kurviraka)
Avar tam tantaiyaiyum, tam camukattaraiyum nokki"ninkal etanai vanankukirirkal? Enak ketta potu
allahvaiyanri poyyana teyvankalaiya ninkal virumpukirirkal
avvarayin akilankalukkellam iraivan parri unkal ennam tan enna?" (Enru kettar)
pinnar avar natcattirankalai oru parvai parttar
niccayamaka nam noyaliyaka irukkiren" enrum kurinar
enave avarai vittum a(varutaiya camukatta)varkal tirumpic cenranar
appal avarkalutaiya teyvankalin pal avar cenru"(unkalukku mun pataikkappattulla unavukalai) ninkal unnamattirkala?" Enru kurinar
unkalukku enna (nerntatu)? Ninkal en pecukirirkalillai?" (Enrum kettar)
pin avar avarrin pakkam tirumpi tam valakkaiyal avarrai atittu (utaittu) vittar
(avarrai vanankupavarkal) avarpal viraintu vantarkal
avar kurinar! "Ninkale cetukkiya ivarraiya vanankukirirkal
unkalaiyum, ninkal ceyta(i)varraiyum, allahve pataittirukkinran
avarkal kurinarkal; "ivarukkaka(p periyatoru neruppuk) kitankai amaittu erineruppil avarai erintu vitunkal
(ivvaraka) avarkal avarukkuc cati ceyya natinarkal; anal, nam avarkalaiye ilivupatutti vittom
melum, avar kurinar; "niccayamaka nan ennutaiya iraivanitam celpavan; tittamaka avan enakku ner valiyaik kanpippan
ennutaiya iraiva! Ni enakku salihana oru nanmakanait tantarulvayaka" (enru pirarttittar)
enave, nam avarukku porumaicaliyana oru makanaik kontu nanmarayan kurinom

Pin (am'makan) avarutan natamatakkutiya (vayatai atainta) potu avar kurinar; "ennarumai makane! Nan unnai aruttu paliyituvataka niccayamakak kanavu kanten. Itaipparri um karuttu enna enpataic cintippiraka!" (Makan) kurinan; "ennarumait tantaiye! Ninkal evappattapatiye ceyyunkal. Allah natinal - ennai ninkal porumaiyalarkalil ninrumullavanakave kanpirkal
akave, avviruvarum (iraivan kattalaikku) murrilum valippattu, (iprahim) makanaip paliyita mukam kuppurakkitattiya potu
nam avarai"ya iprahim!" Enralaittom
titamaka nir (kanta) kanavai meyppatuttinir. Niccayamaka nanmai ceyvorukku nam ivvare kuli kotuttirukkirom
niccayamaka itu telivana oru perun cotanaiyakum
ayinum, nam oru makattan paliyaik kontu avarukkuppa pakaramakkinom
innum avarukkakap pirkalattavarukku (oru napakarttattai) vittu vaittom
salamun ala iprahim" (iprahim mitu salam untavataka)
ivvare, nanmai ceyvorukku, nam kuli kotukkirom
niccayamaka avar muhminkalana nam (nal)latiyarkalil ninrumullavar
salihanavarkalilullavarana napi is'hakkai avarukku innum (makanakat taruvataka) nam nanmarayam kurinom
innum nam avar mitum is'hak mitum pakkiyankal polintom; melum avviruvarutaiya cantatiyaril nanmai ceypavarkalum irukkinrarkal; anriyum tamakkut tame pakirankamaka aniyayam ceytu kolvorum irukkinranar
melum, musa, harun akiyavarkal mitum nam niccayamaka arul purintom
avviruvaraiyum, avviruvarutaiya camukattaraiyum mikapperum tunpattiruntu iratcittom
Melum, nam avarkalukku utavi ceytom; enave avarkal tam verri perroranarkal
avviruvarukkum nam tulakkamana vetattaik kotuttom
innum, nam avviruvarukkum nervaliyaik kanpittom
innum avviruvarukkumakap pirkalattavarukku (oru napakarttattai) vittu vaittom
salamun ala musa va harun" musavukkum, harunukkum salam untavataka
ivvare nanmai ceyvorukku nam kuli kotukkirom
niccayamaka avviruvarum muhminkalana nam (nal)latiyarkalil ninrumullavarkal
melum, niccayamaka ilyasum mursal(kalil - tutaraka anuppappattavar)kalil oruvar tam
avar tam camukattavaritam; "ninkal (iraivanai) anca mattirkala?" Enru (potittuc) colliyatai (ninaivu kurviraka)
ninkal pataippavarkalil mikac cirappanavanai vittu vittu'pahlu' (enum cilaiyai) vanankukirirkala
allahtan - unkalutaiya iraivanum, unkalutai mun cenra mutataiyarkalin iraivanum avan
anal avarkal avaraip poyppittarkal; akaiyal, avarkal (marumaiyil iraivan munne tantanaikkaka) niccayamaka kontu varappatuvarkal
allahvutaiya tuya atiyarkalait tavira. (Ivarkalukku narkuliyuntu)
melum, nam avarukkakap pirkalattavarukku (oru napakarttattai) vittu vaittom
salamun ala ilyasin" ilyasin mitu salamuntavataka
ivvare nanmai ceyvorukku niccayamaka nam kuli kotukkirom
niccayamaka avar muhminkalana nam (nal) atiyarkalil ninrumullavar
melum, luttum niccayamaka mursalkalil - anuppappattavarkalil ninrumullavar
avaraiyum avarutaiya kutumpattar yavaraiyum kattuk kontom
Pinnal tankivittavarkalitaiye iruntuvitta (luttin manaiviyana) kilaviyait tavirttu
pinnar nam marravarkalai alittu vittom
innum, ninkal kalai velaikalil avarkalin (alintu pona urkalin) mite natantu celkirirkal
innum iravilum kuta(c celkirirkal. Itaikkontu) ninkal nallarivu pera mattirkala
melum, yunusum niccayamaka mursalkalil - anuppappattavarkalil ninrumullavar
nirappappatta kappalin pal avar olittotiya potu
a(kkappalilulla)varkal cittukkulukkip pottup parttanar - ivar tam kurramullavar (enru tirmanittanar)
akave, (avarkalutaiya) palippukkitamana nilaiyil (katalil) eriyappata ventiyavaranar oru min vilunkirru
anal avar (min vayirrinul) iraivanait tuticeytu - taspihu ceytu - kontiravittal
(marumaiyil avar) eluppappatum nalvarai, atan vayirrileye tankiyiruntiruppar
anal, avar noyurrirunta nilaiyil, nam avarai (min vayirriliruntu veliyerri) vetta veliyil pottom
anriyum nam avarukku mel oru curaikkotiyai mulaippit(tu nilalitumaru cey)tom
melum, nam avarai oru nurayiram allatu atarkatikamanavarkalitam anuppi vaittom
akave avarkal iman kontarkal. Akaiyal avarkalai oru kalamvarai cukik; kacceytom
(napiye!) Avarkalitam kelum; um iraivanukkup pen makkalaiyum avarkalukku anmakkalaiyuma (karpanai ceykirarkal) enru
allatu nam malakkukalaip penkalakava pataittom? (Atarku) avarkal catcikala
arintu kolka! Niccayamaka ivarkal tankal karpanaiyil tan kurukinranar
allah pillaikalaip perran" (enru kurupavarkal) niccayamakap poyyarkale
(Anriyum, allah) avan anmakkalai vittup penmakkalait terntetuttuk kontana
unkalukku enna (nerntu vittatu)? Evvaru ninkal tirmanikkirirkal
ninkal cintittunara mattirkala
allatu unkalitam telivana ataram etuvum irukkirata
ninkal unmaiyalarkalayiruppin, unkal veta (atara)ttaik kontu varunkal
anriyum ivarkal allahvukkum jinkalukkumitaiyil (vamcavali) uravai (karpanaiyaka) erpatuttukinranar anal jinkalum (marumaiyil iraivan mun) niccayamakak kontuvarappatuvarkal enpatai arinteyirukkirarkal
enave, avarkal ivvaru varnippatai vittum allah mikavum paricuttamanavan
antaranka cuttiyana allahvin atiyarkalait tavirttu
akaiyal, niccayamaka ninkalum ninkal vanankupavaiyum
(evaraiyum allahvukku) etiraka ninkal valiketuttu vitamutiyatu
narakaic cenrataipavarkalait tavira
(melum malakkukal kurukirarkal;)"kurippitappatta or itam illatavaraka titamaka enkalil evarumillai
niccayamaka, nankal (allahvin evalai etirparttu) anivakuttavarkalakave (nirkinrom)
melum, niccayamaka nankal (allahvait tuti ceytu) taspihu ceypavarkalaka irukkirom
(napiye! Makkavacikal munnar) kurikkontiruntarkal
munnorkalitamiruntu, (enkalukku irai ninaivuttum) etenum oru vetattai nankal perriruntal
allahvutaiya tuya atiyarkalaka nankal niccayamaka akiyiruppom" enru
anal (tiruk kur'an vantapotu) avarkal atai nirakarikkirarkal - (itan palanai) viraivileye avarkal arintu kolvarkal
tutarkalakiya nam atiyarkalitam, munnare titamaka namvakkuc cenrirukkiratu
(Atavatu) niccayamaka avarkal utavi ceyyappatuvarkal
melum, nam pataikale niccayamaka avarkale verri peruvarkal
(akave, napiye!) Ciritu kalam varaiyil nir avarkalai vittum vilakiyiruppiraka
(avarkalin nilai ennavakiratu enpatai) nir kavanippiraka! (Tankalukku nerappovatai) avarkalum kavanipparkal
nam(mitamiruntu varum) vetanaikkakava avarkal avacarappatukirarkal
(avvetanai) avarkalutaiya murrattil irankumpotu accamutti eccarikkappatta avarkalin vitiyal mikak kettataka irukkum
akave, ciritu kalam varai nir avarkalai vittum vilakiyiruppiraka
(avarkalin nilai ennavakiratu enpatai) nir kavanippiraka! (Tankalukku nerap povatai) avarkalum kavanipparkal
avarkal varnippatai vittum, kanniyattin iraivanana um'mutaiya iraivan tuyavan
melum mursal(kalana avan tutar)kal mitu salam untavataka
val'hamtu lillahi rappil alamim (innum pukal anaittum akilankalin iraivanakiya allahvukke urittakum)
